      • findCallerClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> findCallerClass(int framesToSkip)
        Returns the class this method was called 'framesToSkip' frames up the caller hierarchy. NOTE: Extremely expensive! Please consider not using it. These aren't the droids you're looking for!
